name: Pastorillo
description:
Your sheepdog is alone in an island in the middle of the sea. He only want to take care of the flock, knows that a flock need grass, but to complete this great task he need to understand where to bring them.

Follow the tutorial and have fun to complete all the small tasks.

    Controls:
  • WSDA: for movement
  • SHIFT: to more speed
  • ENTER: to take action
  • ESC: to pause
